caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 7. Geographic location of specimens of
Aegla spp
. from Museo de La Plata Collection. A,
Aegla neuquensis .
B,
Aegla platensis
. C,
Aegla riolimayana
. D,
Aegla uruguayana
.
